title: Bye Bill O'Brien, Stephon Gilmore and the NFL's Rising COVID-19 Problem, and the Chicago Bears' Offensive Struggles | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Warren Sharp and Chris Vernon offer their thoughts on the Texans’ firing of Bill O’Brien and the NFL’s rising COVID-19 problem (11:00). They also discuss the Chicago Bears’ offensive struggles and their starting quarterback race (26:22), decide whether the Cleveland Browns are legit (53:00), and more.
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Chris Vernon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
